statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); session_id=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.session_id'); git_branch=$(cd "$cwd" 2>/dev/null && git -c core.useBuiltinFSMonitor=false rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null); session_dir="$HOME/.claude/sessions"; mkdir -p "$session_dir"; session_file="$session_dir/$session_id"; if [ ! -f "$session_file" ]; then date +%s > "$session_file"; fi; start_time=$(cat "$session_file" 2>/dev/null || echo $(date +%s)); current_time=$(date +%s); duration_seconds=$((current_time - start_time)); hours=$((duration_seconds / 3600)); minutes=$(((duration_seconds % 3600) / 60)); if [ $hours -gt 0 ]; then duration_str="${hours}h ${minutes}m"; else duration_str="${minutes}m"; fi; printf '\033[0;36m%s\033[0m' "$cwd"; if [ -n "$git_branch" ]; then printf ' \033[0;33m(%s)\033[0m' "$git_branch"; fi; printf ' \033[0;35m[%s]\033[0m' "$model"; printf ' \033[0;32m[%s]\033[0m' "$duration_str"
